channel.title: Suprabhat Kumar - Front-End Development Blog
channel.description: Insights and tutorials on front-end development, performance, accessibility, and modern React practices.

item.title: Why Clean and Minimal UI Works Better for Professional Websites
item.description: Learn why clean, minimal UI builds trust, improves clarity, and helps professional websites convert with beginner-friendly tips.

item.title: Building Accessible React Components with TypeScript
item.description: Learn how to create accessible React components using TypeScript, ARIA, keyboard navigation, and screen reader support.

item.title: Next.js Performance Optimization: Real-World Tips
item.description: Boost Next.js performance with image optimization, code splitting, and caching strategies.

item.title: CSS Flexbox Tutorial for Beginners: A Complete Guide
item.description: Learn CSS Flexbox from scratch and build responsive layouts with practical examples.

item.title: React Query vs Redux Toolkit: When to Use Each
item.description: Understand when to use React Query or Redux Toolkit with simple comparisons and examples.

item.title: How to Center a Div in CSS: 5 Easy Methods That Work
item.description: Five reliable ways to center elements in CSS using Flexbox, Grid, and positioning.

item.title: Lazy Loading Images for Better Core Web Vitals
item.description: Improve Core Web Vitals with lazy loading and image optimization techniques.

item.title: ARIA Patterns in React: Complete Beginner's Guide
item.description: Learn ARIA roles, states, and patterns to build accessible React interfaces.

item.title: JavaScript Array Methods Explained: map, filter, and reduce
item.description: Master map, filter, and reduce with clear examples for cleaner JavaScript.

item.title: Keyboard Navigation in Single Page Applications
item.description: Make SPAs accessible with keyboard navigation, focus management, and skip links.

item.title: Screen Reader Testing for React Developers
item.description: Step-by-step guide to testing React apps with NVDA and VoiceOver.

item.title: Building Accessible Forms with React Hook Form
item.description: Create accessible forms with validation, error messages, and ARIA labels.
